"'''The House of Black and White'''"<ref>[http://watchersonthewall.com/first-three-episode-titles-game-thrones-season-5-revealed/]</ref> is the second episode of the [[Season 5|fifth season]] of ''[[Game of Thrones]]''. It is the forty-second episode of the series overall. It will premiere on April 19, 2015. It was directed by [[Michael Slovis]].
sections.Notes: *The episode title is a reference to the [[House of Black and White]], a notable location in the [[Free Cities|Free City]] of [[Braavos]].

title: The House of Black and White
